source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Methods of 3D VFX Compositing Nuke Masterclass - NK202
items.headline: Learn 3d VFX Compositing workflows inside of Nuke from a PRO.  Projections, 3d camera tracking, cleanplating, and more!
objectives_summary: Planar Tracking / Cornerpin Techniques / Texture Extraction
3D Compositing Theory (Parallax, Camera Moves, Camera Solves, Triangulation, and MORE.)
Integration Techniques

items.title: Achieve 3D Photorealism in Blender 2.8: Subway Challenge
items.headline: Master the Skill of Turning Any Image Reference Into a Realistic 3D Scene
objectives_summary: Learn the Secret to Turn any Image Reference into a 3D realistic Scene
Achieve 3D Photorealism based on Real References NOT Imaginary Scenes
Creating Realistic Materials from Scratch using Substance Designer

items.title: VFX Compositing with Nuke: The Complete 2D Edition

visible_instructors.title: Vicki Lau
visible_instructors.job_title: Multi-Hyphenate Artist, VFX Pro, TEDx Speaker, Author
visible_instructors.name: Vicki

items.headline: A comprehensive guide to 2D compositing for live-action films in post-production visual effects using Nuke.
objectives_summary: Know what, when and how to do simple to advanced compositing in Nuke
Know how to use The Foundry Nuke for simple to advanced compositing of 2D live-action shots
Apply basic and advanced techniques in 2D compositing

items.title: Adobe After Effects: Advanced Shape Layers
items.headline: Animate shape layers to create hip, professional, and powerful motion graphics in After Effects. Start learning today!
objectives_summary: Become After Effects Master!
Learn to be more creative while making motion graphics
Be able to replicate hip After Effects shape animations

items.title: Rigging and Recording in Adobe Character Animator
items.headline: Learn how to animate characters using your video camera and microphone! No prior animation experience required!
objectives_summary: Properly assemble rigs in Photoshop for Character Animator
Add tags for proper behavior tracking
Add handles for pin, draggable and physics effects

items.title: BlendMasters Vol. 1: Model a Concept Car for Film in Blender
items.headline: Take your modeling skills to the next level by creating a realistic car ready for your film and visual effects projects.
objectives_summary: Model a fully detailed hard surface car model in Blender
Tackle advanced modeling challenges while working from concept art
Evaluate complex geometry, find solutions to broken topology, and properly smooth and crease using subdivision surfaces

items.title: 3ds Max + VRay: Materials Masterclass

visible_instructors.name: Adam
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Artist & Instructor - 3ds Max / V-Ray / Photoshop
visible_instructors.title: Adam Zollinger

items.headline: Use 3ds Max to create professional, photoreal materials.  Shaders include VRay, Corona, Mental Ray, V-ray for SketchUp
objectives_summary: Create photoreal 3d materials using a professional workflow
Take the principles from this course and begin applying them in 3d to improve texturing skills
Better understand settings of various different types of materials, in various render engines

items.title: Learn Cinema 4D - Create Abstract 3D Design Elements
items.headline: Jumpstart your Cinema 4D skills by learning how to make abstract 3D shapes
objectives_summary: Learn how to make 3d elements in Cinema 4D that are great for adding color and flow to any design, such as screen wallpapers and more
Learn the fundamentals of Cinema 4D with a hands-on, project-based approach
Learn a flexible procedural workflow that allows you to create a variety of shapes and designs with ease

items.title: Learning Maya after knowing 3ds Max : Modeling

visible_instructors.name: Bradley
visible_instructors.job_title: 3D Environment Artist in Video Game Industry
visible_instructors.title: Bradley Wascher

items.headline: Want to learn how to use Maya after you already know 3ds max? Making the switch was never easier.
objectives_summary: Overview of fundamental UI differences
Location of most used tools and techniques for modeling
Explaining high poly modeling workflow

items.title: Creating animation in Synfig Studio
items.headline: Learn how to create 2D animation with free and open-source software
objectives_summary: Create basic tweened animation using bitmap images (sprites)
Construct and animate simple cutout characters
Use skeleton to construct and animate complex characters

items.title: 3ds Max + V-Ray: Complete 3D Photorealistic Rendering Course
items.headline: Create Beautiful Photorealistic 3D Renderings with 3ds Max + V-Ray | Taught by an award-winning 3ds Max + V-ray designer
objectives_summary: Create your own photorealistic renderings from scratch with 3ds Max + Vray
Become confident using 3ds Max + V-Ray
Find paid work & get a job with your 3ds Max + V-Ray skills

items.title: Beginning Fusion 360
items.headline: Learn to use Fusion 360 and all of its design tools so that making your own designs is a breeze
objectives_summary: Designing Objects in Fusion 360

items.title: Mastering Drivers in Blender 3D
items.headline: Learn powerful tools to make your objects dynamic and automatic without having to write code
objectives_summary: Create advanced rigging for your objects, characters, etc.
Set up complex relationships between different objects in your scenes
Control multiple objects at once with the same settings and controls

items.title: Learn Animation Production with Blender 2.9
items.headline: Learn to use Blender to create your own 3D animations.
objectives_summary: 3D Modeling in Blender
Create Complex Textures in Blender
3D Animation

items.title: Zbrush 2021 Course for Absolute Beginners
items.headline: Unleash your Fear of Zbrush and Start creating with Confident.
objectives_summary: Zbrush Interface
Sculpting Technics
Hard Surface Tools

items.title: Learning Autodesk Maya 2016
items.headline: Learn how to make amazing models in Maya - Taught by a World leading expert
objectives_summary: Learn the key skills to master Maya and create amazing models

Once you have completed this training course, you will be be fully capable of modeling, texturing, animating, and rendering in Autodesk Maya. Working files are included, allowing you to follow along with the author throughout the lessons.
